synonyms.synonym: SubName: cDNA FLJ75695, highly similar to Homo sapiens galactose mutarotase (aldose 1-epimerase) (GALM), mRNA

protein.specific_function: Mutarotase converts alpha-aldose to the beta-anomer. It is active on D-glucose, L-arabinose, D-xylose, D-galactose, maltose and lactose (By similarity).
